title: Trobleshooting on the Update
body: It is stopping at the 33% point to scan files, but it continues to tell me that unspecified error has occurred. Can someone help me to get this working again please?

replies.body: At 33% your patcher is trying to connect to the patching servers but failing.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and restore comms.  Let me know if you have any questions!

No worries, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help!  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to your ticket for more context.  We'll reach out as soon as we can!
Thank you for all the great help. I was able to get it running by installing  a new anti virus software.
